all_procs.pre_screen.csv:
item,phasetype,survey,max_time,notes,condition,text,shuffle_1,task_title,task_body_text,weight, 0,uor_cover,,user,no_mobile,,Welcome,,,,, 0,msc_ppt_setup,,user,{PPT ID},,,,,Pre_Screen,, 0,msc_info_consent,,user,{CONSENT},,Investigating the impact of online disinhibition on the behavioural effects of swearing,,,Pre_Screen,, 0,tde_survey,ppt-demographics.csv,user,{DEMO},,,,,,, 0,uor_cover_end,,user,,,Session Complete,,,,, 0,msc_midsession_debrief_sheet,,user,,,,,,Pre_Screen,, 0,save_data,,user,"Thank you for pilot testing the 'text instructions' study.

Please provide feedback on your experience by clicking the link below. It's a short, 10-item questionnaire that allows me to ensure everything works smoothly before I start collecting data for real.
https://forms.office.com/r/kgcd2tMduG
Thank you. Chris",,ðŸ’¾ Please Save Your Data ðŸ’¾,,Save your data,"There have been some issues with data not correctly being sent to the server, even though the study claims to have done so. I'm not 100% sure why this is occurring though which is making it hard to fix.

As a result, please can you click the button below and save the .csv file to your computer. I'll send you an email once I've checked the server letting you know if there have been any problems but, by saving your data, if there are any issues, I can use the .csv file to manually add anything that's missing, which means your time hasn't been wasted and/or my dissertation results impacted by an issue outside our control.

If the button doesn't work for any reason, you can save your data by pressing Ctrl+S (Cmd+S on a Mac) too. Obviously, please don't delete this file from your computer until I've sent you an email saying all the data was correctly uploaded to the server.

Finally, if you could email c.g.dobson@student.reading.ac.uk to let me know you've signed up that would be great. There is currently a chance I won't be notified!",,
all_procs.researcher_taboo.csv:
item,phasetype,survey,max_time,notes,text,shuffle_1,shuffle_2,task_title,task_body_text,weight, 0,uor_cover,,user,no_mobile,Welcome,,,,,, 0,msc_ppt_setup,,user,,,,,,,, 0,msc_info_consent,,user,,Investigating the impact of online disinhibition on the behavioural effects of swearing,,,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{BART INS},Start,,Taboo,Balloon Inflation Task,"

During the next task, you will be presented with 10 balloons, one at a time, as shown below. For each balloon you must repeatedly click on the button labelled 'Inflate Balloon' to increase its size, gaining 5 points for each click with which the balloon doesn't burst to score as many points as possible.

At any point, you can stop pumping up the balloon and click on 'Collect Points'. This will move you on the next balloon and will bank the points you scored from the previous balloon (under 'Total Points Earned'). It is your choice to determine how many clicks to make before banking your points, but remember each balloon will burst at some point. This point varies across all balloons, ranging from the first click to the sixtieth (i.e., enough to fill its entire box).



If the balloon explodes before you click on 'Collect Points', then all points for that balloon are lost. Burst balloons do not affect the points accumulated overall and the speed at which you pump does not affect the likelihood of the balloon bursting.

",, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL INS},Continue,,Taboo,Vocalisation Task,"

However, before you undertake the 'Balloon Inflation' Task, you are required to complete a vocalisation task by repeating the following word out loud for 20 seconds:


'Fuck'


When you are ready to speak, please click 'Start' below. This will move you to another page which displays a 20 second countdown timer. Please repeat 'Fuck', at your normal speaking rate and volume until the countdown ends.

",, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL},,,Taboo,FUCK,"

Please wait for the researcher to ask you to speak
The word to repeat is FUCK

",, 0,bart,,user,{BART},,,Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,Lexical Decision Task,"

Thank you for completing the BART task. On the next page you will initially see a cross in the centre of the screen that will then be replaced with a word.
Once the word appears, you have 2 seconds to decide whether the word rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task and press a corresponding key.

• If the word rhymes you should press P
• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.

Initially, you will have 10 practice trials which will provide you with feedback as to whether you response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 82 to 91,ldt_with_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle 1,Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,End Of Practice Trials,"

That completes the practice trials. You will now complete the experimental trials. Once again, all you have to do is decide whether the word displayed in the centre of the screen rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task.

• If the word rhymes press P

• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.
Please note: The following experimental trials do not provide you with feedback as to whether your response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 2 to 41,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle 2,Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FUCK,,Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FUCK,,Taboo,,,, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,,Start,,,Wordsearch,"

Thank you for completing the first half of this experimental session.

Before starting the second half, in which you'll repeat the previous set of tasks after vocalising a different word for 20 seconds, we'd like to give you a short break.

On the next screen you will see, on the left, a grid of letters and, on the right, a list of 10 types of tea and biscuits. Each item is hidden within the grid of letters. When you find an item within the grid, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden item, the block-line will turn green and the item will be crossed off the list.

You have 3 minutes to find as many items as you can. A sliding bar below the wordsearch indicates how long you have left. If you find all the items before the time is up a ""New Game"" button will appear on the screen below the completed list. Click this button to refresh the wordsearch and generate a new list of items so you can carry on searching.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!



",, 0,wordsearch_msc_cgd,,300,{WORDSEARCH},,,,,,, 0,wordsearch_feedback,,user,{WORDSEARCH},,,,Wordsearch Task Complete,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{BART},Start,,Non-Taboo,Balloon Inflation Task,"

During the next task, you will be presented with 10 balloons, one at a time, as shown below. For each balloon you must repeatedly click on the button labelled 'Inflate Balloon' to increase its size, gaining 5 points for each click with which the balloon doesn't burst to score as many points as possible.

At any point, you can stop pumping up the balloon and click on 'Collect Points'. This will move you on the next balloon and will bank the points you scored from the previous balloon (under 'Total Points Earned'). It is your choice to determine how many clicks to make before banking your points, but remember each balloon will burst at some point. This point varies across all balloons, ranging from the first click to the sixtieth (i.e., enough to fill its entire box).



If the balloon explodes before you click on 'Collect Points', then all points for that balloon are lost. Burst balloons do not affect the points accumulated overall and the speed at which you pump does not affect the likelihood of the balloon bursting.

",, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL INS},Continue,,Non-Taboo,Vocalisation Task,"

However, before you undertake the 'Balloon Inflation' Task, you are required to complete a vocalisation task by repeating the following word out loud for 20 seconds:


'Flat'


When you are ready to speak, please click 'Start' below. This will move you to another page which displays a 20 second countdown timer. Please repeat 'Flat', at your normal speaking rate and volume until the countdown ends.

",, 0,task_bookend,,user,{BART},,,Non-Taboo,FLAT,"

Please wait for the researcher to ask you to speak
The word to repeat is FUCK

",, 0,bart,,user,{BART},,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Non-Taboo,Lexical Decision Task,"

Thank you for completing the BART task. On the next page you will initially see a cross in the centre of the screen that will then be replaced with a word.
Once the word appears, you have 2 seconds to decide whether the word rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task and press a corresponding key.

• If the word rhymes you should press P
• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.

Initially, you will have 10 practice trials which will provide you with feedback as to whether you response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 92 to 101,ldt_with_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle 3,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Non-Taboo,End Of Practice Trials,"

That completes the practice trials. You will now complete the experimental trials. Once again, all you have to do is decide whether the word displayed in the centre of the screen rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task.

• If the word rhymes press P

• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.
Please note: The following experimental trials do not provide you with feedback as to whether your response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 42 to 81,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle 4,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,uor_cover_end,,,,Session Complete,,,,,, 0,uor_end,,user,,,,,,,, 0,save_data,,user,,ðŸ’¾ Please Save Your Data ðŸ’¾,,,Save Your Data,"

There have been some issues with data not correctly being sent to the server, even though the study claims toÂ  have done so. I'm not 100% sure why this is occurring though which is makingÂ  it hard to fix.

As a result, please can you click theÂ  button below and save the .csv file to your computer. I'll send you an emailÂ  once I've checked the server letting you know if there have been any problemsÂ  but, by saving your data, if there are any issues, I can use the .csv file toÂ  manually add anything that's missing, which means your time hasn't beenÂ  wasted and/or my dissertation results impacted by an issue outside ourÂ  control.

If the button doesn't work for any reason, youÂ  can save your data by pressing Ctrl+S (Cmd+S on a Mac) too. Obviously, pleaseÂ  don't delete this file from your computer until I've sent you an email sayingÂ  all the data was correctly uploaded to theÂ  server.

Finally, if you could email c.g.dobson@student.reading.ac.ukÂ  to let me know you've signed up that would be great. There is currently aÂ  chance I won't be notified!

",,

",, 42 to 81,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle 4,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Non-Taboo,,,, 0,uor_cover_end,,,,Session Complete,,,,,, 0,uor_end,,user,,,,,,,, 0,save_data,,user,,ðŸ’¾ Please Save Your Data ðŸ’¾,,,Save Your Data,"

There have been some issues with data not correctly being sent to the server, even though the study claims toÂ  have done so. I'm not 100% sure why this is occurring though which is makingÂ  it hard to fix.

As a result, please can you click theÂ  button below and save the .csv file to your computer. I'll send you an emailÂ  once I've checked the server letting you know if there have been any problemsÂ  but, by saving your data, if there are any issues, I can use the .csv file toÂ  manually add anything that's missing, which means your time hasn't beenÂ  wasted and/or my dissertation results impacted by an issue outside ourÂ  control.

If the button doesn't work for any reason, youÂ  can save your data by pressing Ctrl+S (Cmd+S on a Mac) too. Obviously, pleaseÂ  don't delete this file from your computer until I've sent you an email sayingÂ  all the data was correctly uploaded to theÂ  server.

Finally, if you could email c.g.dobson@student.reading.ac.ukÂ  to let me know you've signed up that would be great. There is currently aÂ  chance I won't be notified!

all_procs.eyes_nontab.csv:
item,phasetype,survey,max_time,notes,text,shuffle_1,shuffle_2,task_title,task_body_text,weight, 0,uor_cover,,user,no_mobile,Welcome,,,,,0, 0,msc_ppt_setup,,user,,,,,,,0, 0,msc_info_consent,,user,,Investigating the impact of online disinhibition on the behavioural effects of swearing,,,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{BART INS},Start,,Non-Taboo,Balloon Inflation Task,"

During the next task, you will be presented with 10 balloons, one at a time, as shown below. For each balloon you must repeatedly click on the button labelled 'Inflate Balloon' to increase its size, gaining 5 points for each click with which the balloon doesn't burst to score as many points as possible.

At any point, you can stop pumping up the balloon and click on 'Collect Points'. This will move you on the next balloon and will bank the points you scored from the previous balloon (under 'Total Points Earned'). It is your choice to determine how many clicks to make before banking your points, but remember each balloon will burst at some point. This point varies across all balloons, ranging from the first click to the sixtieth (i.e., enough to fill its entire box).



If the balloon explodes before you click on 'Collect Points', then all points for that balloon are lost. Burst balloons do not affect the points accumulated overall and the speed at which you pump does not affect the likelihood of the balloon bursting.

",0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL INS},Continue,,Non-Taboo,Vocalisation Task,"

However, before you undertake the 'Balloon Inflation' Task, you are required to complete a vocalisation task by repeating the following word out loud for 20 seconds whilst making eye-contact with an on-screen image:


'Flat'


When you are ready to speak, please click 'Start' below. This will move you to another page which displays the image and a a 20 second countdown timer. Please repeat 'Flat', at your normal speaking rate and volume until the countdown ends.

",0, 0,msc_vocalisation,,21,{VOCAL},eyes,,Non-Taboo,FLAT,"

Please remember to speak at your normal rate, volume, and rhythm while making eye-contact with the eyes below

",0, 0,bart,,user,{BART},,,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Non-Taboo,Lexical Decision Task,"

Thank you for completing the BART task. On the next page you will initially see a cross in the centre of the screen that will then be replaced with a word.
Once the word appears, you have 2 seconds to decide whether the word rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task and press a corresponding key.

• If the word rhymes you should press P
• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.

Initially, you will have 10 practice trials which will provide you with feedback as to whether you response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.



",0, 82 to 91,ldt_with_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle1,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Non-Taboo,End Of Practice Trials,"

That completes the practice trials. You will now complete the experimental trials. Once again, all you have to do is decide whether the word displayed in the centre of the screen rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task.

• If the word rhymes press P

• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.
Please note: The following experimental trials do not provide you with feedback as to whether your response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",0, 2 to 41,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle2,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Non-Taboo,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,,Start,,,Wordsearch,"

Thank you for completing the first half of this experimental session.

Before starting the second half, in which you'll repeat the previous set of tasks after vocalising a different word for 20 seconds, we'd like to give you a short break.

On the next screen you will see, on the left, a grid of letters and, on the right, a list of 10 types of tea and biscuits. Each item is hidden within the grid of letters. When you find an item within the grid, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden item, the block-line will turn green and the item will be crossed off the list.

You have 3 minutes to find as many items as you can. A sliding bar below the wordsearch indicates how long you have left. If you find all the items before the time is up a ""New Game"" button will appear on the screen below the completed list. Click this button to refresh the wordsearch and generate a new list of items so you can carry on searching.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!



",0, 0,wordsearch_msc_cgd,,300,{WORDSEARCH},,,,,,0, 0,wordsearch_feedback,,user,{WORDSEARCH},,,,Wordsearch Task Complete,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{BART},Start,,Taboo,Balloon Inflation Task,"

During the next task, you will be presented with 10 balloons, one at a time, as shown below. For each balloon you must repeatedly click on the button labelled 'Inflate Balloon' to increase its size, gaining 5 points for each click with which the balloon doesn't burst to score as many points as possible.

At any point, you can stop pumping up the balloon and click on 'Collect Points'. This will move you on the next balloon and will bank the points you scored from the previous balloon (under 'Total Points Earned'). It is your choice to determine how many clicks to make before banking your points, but remember each balloon will burst at some point. This point varies across all balloons, ranging from the first click to the sixtieth (i.e., enough to fill its entire box).



If the balloon explodes before you click on 'Collect Points', then all points for that balloon are lost. Burst balloons do not affect the points accumulated overall and the speed at which you pump does not affect the likelihood of the balloon bursting.

",0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL INS},Continue,,Taboo,Vocalisation Task,"

However, before you undertake the 'Balloon Inflation' Task, you are required to complete a vocalisation task by repeating the following word out loud for 20 seconds whilst making eye-contact with an on-screen image:


'Fuck'


When you are ready to speak, please click 'Start' below. This will move you to another page which displays the image and a a 20 second countdown timer. Please repeat 'Fuck', at your normal speaking rate and volume until the countdown ends.

",0, 0,msc_vocalisation,,21,{VOCAL},eyes,,Taboo,FUCK,"

Please remember to speak at your normal rate, volume, and rhythm while making eye-contact with the eyes below

",0, 0,bart,,user,{BART},,,Taboo,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,Lexical Decision Task,"

Thank you for completing the BART task. On the next page you will initially see a cross in the centre of the screen that will then be replaced with a word.
Once the word appears, you have 2 seconds to decide whether the word rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task and press a corresponding key.

• If the word rhymes you should press P
• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.

Initially, you will have 10 practice trials which will provide you with feedback as to whether you response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",0, 92 to 101,ldt_with_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle3,Taboo,,,0, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,End Of Practice Trials,"

That completes the practice trials. You will now complete the experimental trials. Once again, all you have to do is decide whether the word displayed in the centre of the screen rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task.

• If the word rhymes press P

• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.
Please note: The following experimental trials do not provide you with feedback as to whether your response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",0, 42 to 81,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle4,Taboo,,,0, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FUCK,,Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FUCK,,Taboo,,,, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Taboo,,,, 0,uor_cover_end,,,,Session Complete,,,,,, 0,uor_end,,user,,,,,,,, 0,save_data,,user,,ðŸ’¾ Please Save Your Data ðŸ’¾,,,Save Your Data,"

As a result, please can you click theÂ  button below and save the .csv file to your computer. I'll send you an emailÂ  once I've checked the server letting you know if there have been any problemsÂ  but, by saving your data, if there are any issues, I can use the .csv file toÂ  manually add anything that's missing, which means your time hasn't beenÂ  wasted and/or my dissertation results impacted by an issue outside ourÂ  control.

It is your choice to determine how many clicks to make before banking your points, but remember each balloon will burst at some point. This point varies across all balloons, ranging from the first click to the sixtieth (i.e., enough to fill its entire box).



If the balloon explodes before you click on 'Collect Points', then all points for that balloon are lost. Burst balloons do not affect the points accumulated overall and the speed at which you pump does not affect the likelihood of the balloon bursting.

",, 0,task_bookend,,user,{VOCAL INS},Continue,,Taboo,Vocalisation Task,"

However, before you undertake the 'Balloon Inflation' Task, you are required to complete a vocalisation task by repeating the following word out loud for 20 seconds:

'Flat'


whilst making eye-contact with an on-screen image.

When you are ready to speak, please click 'Start' below. This will move you to another page which displays the image and a a 20 second countdown timer. Please repeat 'Flat', at your normal speaking rate and volume until the countdown ends.

",, 0,msc_vocalisation,,21,{VOCAL},eyes,,Taboo,FLAT,"

Please remember to speak at your normal rate, volume, and rhythm while making eye-contact with the eyes below

",, 0,bart,,user,{BART},,,Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,Lexical Decision Task,"

Thank you for completing the BART task. On the next page you will initially see a cross in the centre of the screen that will then be replaced with a word.
Once the word appears, you have 2 seconds to decide whether the word rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task and press a corresponding key.

• If the word rhymes you should press P
• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.

Initially, you will have 10 practice trials which will provide you with feedback as to whether you response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 92 to 101,ldt_with_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle3,Taboo,,,, 0,task_bookend,,user,{LDT},,,Taboo,End Of Practice Trials,"

That completes the practice trials. You will now complete the experimental trials. Once again, all you have to do is decide whether the word displayed in the centre of the screen rhymes with the word you repeated out loud for 20 seconds before the previous balloon inflation task.

• If the word rhymes press P

• If the word does not rhyme press Q

Please position your index fingers over the required P and Q keys, as shown below before starting.
Please note: The following experimental trials do not provide you with feedback as to whether your response was correct or not.

When you are ready and positioned your fingers as shown, press the Spacebar with your thumb to start the task.

",, 42 to 81,ldt_no_practice,,user,{LDT},,Shuffle4,Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_offensiveness,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Taboo,,,, 0,msc_vas_humour,,user,{VAS},FLAT,,Taboo,,,, 0,tde_survey,cognitive_dissonance.csv,user,{COG DIS},,,Taboo,,,, 0,uor_cover_end,,,,Session Complete,,,,,, 0,uor_end,,user,,,,,,,, 0,save_data,,user,,ðŸ’¾ Please Save Your Data ðŸ’¾,,,Save Your Data,"

There have been some issues with data not correctly being sent to the server, even though the study claims toÂ  have done so. I'm not 100% sure why this is occurring though which is makingÂ  it hard to fix.

As a result, please can you click theÂ  button below and save the .csv file to your computer. I'll send you an emailÂ  once I've checked the server letting you know if there have been any problemsÂ  but, by saving your data, if there are any issues, I can use the .csv file toÂ  manually add anything that's missing, which means your time hasn't beenÂ  wasted and/or my dissertation results impacted by an issue outside ourÂ  control.

If the button doesn't work for any reason, youÂ  can save your data by pressing Ctrl+S (Cmd+S on a Mac) too. Obviously, pleaseÂ  don't delete this file from your computer until I've sent you an email sayingÂ  all the data was correctly uploaded to theÂ  server.

Finally, if you could email c.g.dobson@student.reading.ac.ukÂ  to let me know you've signed up that would be great. There is currently aÂ  chance I won't be notified!

",,

ppt-demographics.csv:
Demographic Information


Please could you help us better understand the diversity and inclusivity of your participants (and thus how well our data is applicable to the general population) by completing the questions below.

Questions 1-5 are optional, you do not have to answer if you wish (please select "Prefer not to say", if that is the case). Answers for questions 6, 7, and 8 are required, however, as you will be unable to take part in the rest of the study without supplying that information. Finally, we are collecting your demographic information before you begin any testing session to ensure that each session has an identical procedure (as this increases the validity of our final results).

1. Please enter your age (in years)
(the input only accepts numbers e.g., 21)
2. Which gender identity do you identify most with
Male|Female|Non-binary|Prefer to self-identify|Prefer not to say
4. What is the highest level of education you have completed?
GCSEs or equivalent|A-Levels or equivalent|University undergraduate programme (e.g., BSc)|University postgraduate programme (e.g., MSc)|Doctoral degree|Other|Prefer not to say
5. What is your current employment status
Full-time employment|Part-time employment|Unemployed/Retired/Full-time education|Self-employed|Prefer not to say

6. Are you a native British English Speaker
(defined as someone who was born and raised in the UK,
or moved to the UK before the age of 2)
7. Please indicate whether, upon completion of the study, you wish to be awarded SONA credits, enter the draw to win a Â£50 Amazon gift voucher, or neither

8. Please enter your email address
This is purely to allow the Researchers to contact you regarding each testing session and is not stored with your experimental data
cognitive_dissonance.csv:
Self-Evaluation Questionnaire


Thank you for making your word ratings. Please think back to the last word you repeated aloud for 20 second. Take a moment to think how you felt after repeating the word?

To respond, please rate each statement below by clicking on a number from 1 to 7, whereby 1 = you strongly disagree with the statement, while 7 = you strongly agree with the statement.
I felt I'd let myself down
